room_title: Escape room "The Lost Tomb of Monthu" by America's Escape Game in Miami
review: The Last Tomb of Monthu was amazing and we escaped with 17 minutes left. Noely was a fantastic team leader!

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Tomb of Monthu" by America's Escape Game in Miami
review: Didn't escape the tomb, but my brother and I had a great time, all of the staff were great. One staff member was even an anime fan, I had a great time talking to her. Thanks again guys!

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Tomb of Monthu" by America's Escape Game in Miami
review: The staff was polite and accommodating. The location was clean and all rules and expectations were explained prior to us playing. The tasks were challenging but very fun and entertaining! I can't wait to go back!

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Tomb of Monthu" by America's Escape Game in Miami
review: First time at America's Escape Game and we had a great time! We came close but we didn't "escape". We did the Lost Tomb of Monthu. I had no idea what to expect and it was very challenging. Can't wait to go back and try another room!

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Tomb of Monthu" by America's Escape Game in Miami
review: We had a great time. Siggy and Clarissa were super nice, and very helpful. The puzzles were challenging, but still accessible. Can't wait to come back for the new room when it opens.
